data.title: Cheryl Ladd Biography (1951-)
data.text:
Theatre, Film, and Television Biographies

Brian Klugman to Michael Lantieri

Cheryl Ladd Biography (1951-)

Original name, Cheryl Jean Stoppelmoor; born July 12, 1951, in Huron, SD; daughter of Marion (a railroad engineer) and Dolores (a waitress; maiden name, Katz) Stoppelmoor; married first husband (divorced); married David Ladd (an actor and producer), May 1973 (divorced, September 1980); married Brian Russell(a musician and film producer), January 3, 1981; children: (second marriage)Jordan Elizabeth (an actress); stepchildren: (third marriage) Lindsay Russell (a musician). Addresses: Agent: Don Buchwald & Associates, 6500Wilshire Blvd., Suite 2200, Los Angeles, CA 90048.; Publicist: JDS, 3151 Cahuenga Blvd. West, Suite 220, Los Angeles, CA 90068.

Nationality

American
